description: Explore how Gitcoin Funding Rounds empower the open-source ecosystem by supporting developers and projects through innovative funding models like Quadratic Funding. Discover the impact of community-driven initiatives and the future of open-source sustainability.
keywords: Gitcoin, open-source, funding, developers, Quadratic Funding, grants, blockchain, innovation, sustainability, digital inclusion, community-driven
title: Gitcoin Funding Rounds: Empowering the Open Source Ecosystem
